MeasurementToolMetadata.Description: MDS: Updated probability of prodromal parkinsons disease (2019)

mds_prodrome_age.Description: Prior probability of prodromal PD age categories (note those below 50y on criteria are floored into the bottom age category available for practical reasons)

mds_prodrome_sex.Description: Risk 01: Probability of prodromal PD sex categories

mds_prodrome_caffeine.Description: Risk 04: Consume Caffeinated Bevarage (i.e., <3 cups of coffee/6 cups of black tea per-week)

mds_prodrome_pdfh.Description: Risk 06: Family History of PD (first degree relative)?

mds_prodrome_gba.Description: Risk 07-1: Intermediate Strength Genetic Variants associated with PD - GBA

mds_prodrome_lrrk2.Description: Risk 07-1: Intermediate Strength Genetic Variants associated with PD - LRRK2

Levels.1: High polygenic risk score i.e. highest quartile of PRS scores
Levels.2: Low polygenic risk score i.e. lowest quartile of PRS scores

mds_prodrome_sn.Description: Risk 08: Documented Substantia Nigra Hyperechogenicity on Transcranial Ultrasound (i.e., SN+ corresponds to an uni- or bilateral hyperechogenic area in the SN (>90th percentile of the reference sample))

mds_prodrome_t2dm.Description: Risk 09: Medical Diagnosis of Type II Diabetes Mellitus

mds_prodrome_physical.Description: Risk 10: Physical Inactivity (i.e., <1 hour/week of physical activity causing elevating in breath and heart rate/sweating)

mds_prodrome_psg_dd.Description: A-1.2: Are you able to exclude differential diagnosis when screening for RBD (e.g. possible drug-induced/nacrolepsy-related dream enactment)

mds_prodrome_rbdq.Description: A-1.2: Suspect RBD using questionnaire (RBDQ score >=5 points or positive RBD1Q if RBDQ unavailable)

mds_prodrome_sleep.Description: A-2 Excessive Daytime Somnolence (Possible drug-induced or nacrolepsy-related RBD symptom should be excluded)

mds_prodrome_olfactory.Description: A-3: Olfactory Loss (i.e. total score below age-and-sex-adjusted threshold in a quantitative olfactory test (e.g. Sniffin Stick, UPSIT or B-SIT) - Microsmia or worse

mds_prodrome_constipation.Description: A-4: Constipation (i.e. constipation requiring treatment more than once a week, or spontaneous bowel movement frequency less than every other day

mds_prodrome_noh.Description: A-7a: Orthostatic hypotension based on quantitative assessments of supine/sitting and standing blood pres- sure drop with alternative causes of OH (dehydration, cardiac disease, autonomic neuropathy, medication, etc.) eliminated after comprehensive clinical assessment.

mds_prodrome_soh.Description: A-7b: Symptomatic orthostatic hypotension is based on clinical OH diagnosis or a positive orthostatic hypotension questionnaire without comprehensive diagnostic investigation regarding the cause

mds_prodrome_depression.Description: A-8 Depression with or without anxiety (clinical diagnosis or reaching thresholds of at least moderate depression in depression inventories/questionnaires)

mds_prodrome_cognitive.Description: A-9 Global Cognitive Deficit (i.e. diagnosed with mild cognitive impairment or score more than 1.5SD below the Age-and-sex-adjusted Norm)

mds_prodrome_park.Description: B-1: Subthreshold parkinsonism (UPDRS-III >3 excluding action tremor or MDS-UPDRS-III >6 excluding postural and action tremor)

mds_prodrome_motor.Description: B-2: Quantitative motor testing below one standard deviation of the mean (Abnormalities of quantitative motor tests according to defined thresholds, with performance 1 standard deviation (SD) below age-adjusted normal values. The motor test must be clearly demonstrably abnormal in clinical PD, with specificity compared to controls of ?80%. If multiple quantitative motor tests are performed, the individual must score below threshold on ?50% of them. Uncertain or borderline test results should not be included (use evaluator judgment).)

mds_prodrome_dat.Description: C-1: Clear Abnormality on Dopaminergic Imaging (e.g. < 65% normal, 2SD below mean)

mds_prodrome_prior.LongName: Pre-test odds of prodromal PD based on age
mds_prodrome_prior.Description: Age specific liklihood ratio of Parkinsons disease based on age with no known mutation in identified risk gene (penetrance)

mds_prodrome_lr_sex.LongName: Liklihood ratio: Biological sex at birth

mds_prodrome_lr_pdfh.LongName: Liklihood ratio: Family History of PD

mds_prodrome_lr_gba.LongName: Liklihood ratio: GBA based on age

mds_prodrome_lr_lrrk2.LongName: Liklihood ratio: LRRK2 based on age

Levels.1.57: Low polygenic risk score i.e. lowest quartile of PRS scores

mds_prodrome_lr_sn.LongName: Liklihood ratio: Substantia Nigra Hyperechogenicity on TCUS

mds_prodrome_lr_t2dm.LongName: Liklihood ratio: Type II Diabetes Mellitus

mds_prodrome_lr_motor.LongName: Liklihood ratio: Abnormal quantitative motor testing

mds_prodrome_nonmotor_lr_total.LongName: Total liklihood ratio: Clinical non-motor features

mds_prodrome_motor_lr_total.LongName: Total liklihood ratio: Clinical non-motor features
